com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium

Class WComponentSeleniumTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.WComponentTestCase
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.WComponentSeleniumTestCase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExampleSeleniumTest

    public class WComponentSeleniumTestCase
extends WComponentTestCase
    A WComponent test case which tests the UI using Selenium to drive a web browser.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WComponentSeleniumTestCase(WComponent ui)
      Creates a WComponentSeleniumTestCase.

      Convenience method to create a By search criteria using a WComponent.
      protected org.openqa.selenium.By byWComponentPath(String path)
      Convenience method to create a By search criteria using a WComponent path.

      Convenience method to create a By search criteria using a WComponent path.
      protected org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createDriver()

      protected org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getDriver()
      Retrieves the current driver instance.
      void setBrowser(String browser)
      Sets the browser to use to run the test.
      void setUp()
      Called before each test method to refresh the user session and launch a new browser.
      static void startLde()
      Called once before any test methods, to start the Selenium test LDE if it is not already running.
      static void stopLde()
      Called once after all test methods have completed, to stop the Selenium test LDE if it is the last test being run.
      void tearDown()
      Called after each test method to clear the user session and close the browser window.

        Creates a WComponentSeleniumTestCase.

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
        Called before each test method to refresh the user session and launch a new browser.

      • tearDown

        public void tearDown()
        Called after each test method to clear the user session and close the browser window.

      • startLde

        public static void startLde()
        Called once before any test methods, to start the Selenium test LDE if it is not already running.

      • stopLde

        public static void stopLde()
        Called once after all test methods have completed, to stop the Selenium test LDE if it is the last test being run.

      • setBrowser

        public void setBrowser(String browser)
        Sets the browser to use to run the test.
        Parameters:
        browser - the browser to use.

      • getDriver

        protected final org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getDriver()
        Retrieves the current driver instance. Subclasses should use this to obtain a driver instance for their tests. Note that the driver is disposed of between tests, so it should not be cached in the test classes.
        Returns:
        the driver to use during testing.

      • createDriver

        protected org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createDriver()
        Creates a driver to use during testing. Subclasses may use this to change the browser that is used during testing.
        Returns:
        the driver to use during testing.

      • byWComponentPath

        protected org.openqa.selenium.By byWComponentPath(String path)
        Convenience method to create a By search criteria using a WComponent path.
        Parameters:
        path - the WComponent path, see ByWComponentPath for syntax.
        Returns:
        the By search criteria for the given path.

      • byWComponent

        protected org.openqa.selenium.By byWComponent(WComponent component)
        Convenience method to create a By search criteria using a WComponent.
        Parameters:
        component - the WComponent to search for.
        Returns:
        the By search criteria for the given path.

      • byWComponentPath

        protected org.openqa.selenium.By byWComponentPath(String path,
                                                  Object value)
        Convenience method to create a By search criteria using a WComponent path.
        Parameters:
        path - the WComponent path, see ByWComponentPath for syntax.
        value - the optional value to narrow the search by (for e.g. drop-down lists).
        Returns:
        the By search criteria for the given path.

      • byWComponent

        protected org.openqa.selenium.By byWComponent(WComponent component,
                                              Object value)
        Convenience method to create a By search criteria using a WComponent.
        Parameters:
        component - the WComponent to search for.
        value - the optional value to narrow the search by (for e.g. drop-down lists).
        Returns:
        the By search criteria for the given path.
